parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the steering column can cause the steering wheel to lock up, making it difficult or impossible to turn, which can lead to accidents or loss of control.
symptoms: The steering wheel makes a loud popping sound
the steering wheel becomes difficult to turn
the steering wheel rubs against the plastic trim
the steering wheel is stuck in an upward position
the steering wheel is unable to turn left or right.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The sudden loss of oil can cause engine failure, leading to accidents or leaving the driver stranded.
symptoms: The check engine light is flashing
the engine is popping and jumping
the oil level is low or empty
no oil spots are visible in the driveway.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The faulty passenger airbag occupancy sensor can cause the airbag to malfunction, leading to potential injuries or fatalities in the event of an accident.
symptoms: The airbag light blinks or stays on
the passenger airbag is disabled
the airbag sensor fails to detect an adult passenger
the airbag sensor only detects a passenger intermittently.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The transmission hesitation and erratic shifting can cause a loss of power, delayed acceleration, and sudden downshifts, which can lead to accidents or make the vehicle difficult to control.
symptoms: The vehicle hesitates or delays when accelerating
especially when passing or merging; the transmission shifts erratically
often dropping multiple gears at once; the vehicle lacks power at low speeds; the engine knocks or makes loud noises at low speeds; the transmission bangs or makes loud noises when shifting.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the passenger airbag sensor can lead to the malfunction of the airbag system, which can increase the risk of injury or death in the event of an accident.
symptoms: The airbag warning light is illuminated on the dashboard
the passenger airbag is disabled
and the system may incorrectly detect the presence or absence of a passenger.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The intermittent no-start condition can leave the driver stranded, causing inconvenience and potentially putting them in a dangerous situation.
symptoms: The vehicle fails to start
multiple warning lights (e.g.
engine
brakes
electrical) illuminate on the dashboard
the vehicle starts after a delay
and the battery drains quickly.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Battery Drain or Electrical System Failure
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The battery drain or electrical system failure can cause the vehicle to stall or fail to start, leading to inconvenience and potential safety risks.
symptoms: The battery drains quickly
the vehicle fails to start
and the electrical system malfunctions.
